program semant for multiprogram comput the semant ar defin fora number of meta instruct which perform oper essenti tothe write of program in multiprogram comput system these metainstruct relat to parallel process protect of separ comput programdebug and the share among user of memori segment andother comput object the name of which ar hierarch structurthe languag sophist contempl is midwai between an assembl languagand an advanc algebra languag cacm march 1966 denni jb vanhorn e c ca660301 jb march 3 1978 225 pm 1471 4 1471 1471 4 1471 1774 41471 972 4 1471 276 5 1471 1458 5 14711471 5 1471 1471 5 1471 1471 5 1471 15235 1471 1603 5 1471 1698 5 1471 1747 51471 1748 5 1471 1854 5 1471 1877 5 14711960 5 1471 2377 5 1471 2378 5 1471 24975 1471 2558 5 1471 2625 5 1471 2632 51471 2840 5 1471 2941 5 1471 3105 5 14713144 5 1471 800 5 1471 1421 6 1471 14716 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 61471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 14711471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 14716 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 61471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 1471 6 14711471 6 1471 1471 6 1471 1746 6 1471 17466 1471 1748 6 1471 1749 6 1471 1749 61471 1749 6 1471 1749 6 1471 1749 6 14711753 6 1471 1854 6 1471 2060 6 1471 20806 1471 2080 6 1471 2182 6 1471 2298 61471 2356 6 1471 2358 6 1471 2358 6 14712436 6 1471 2438 6 1471 2491 6 1471 25586 1471 2597 6 1471 2624 6 1471 2625 61471 2625 6 1471 2626 6 1471 2629 6 14712632 6 1471 2632 6 1471 2651 6 1471 28686 1471 2939 6 1471 3068 6 1471
